name: create_bar_chart
description: Generate a customizable bar chart from manual input or a file (Excel, CSV, JSON, JSONL). Supports aggregation (sum, mean, count).

categories.description: Categories for the x-axis if not loading from file

values.description: Values corresponding to the categories if not loading from file

file_path.description: Optional path to a CSV, Excel, JSON, or JSONL file to load chart data from

sheet_name.description: Sheet name or index (for Excel files only)

category_col.description: Column name or index for x-axis (category labels)

value_col.description: Column name or index for y-axis (numeric values)

agg_method.description: Aggregation method if duplicate categories exist

save_path.description: File path to save the generated bar chart image
